definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病变会“漂白了”，成为清洁伤口愈合后，将蜕皮。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to diagnose and discuss the etiologies of vesicular and bullous skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 学习诊断及探讨水疱及大疱皮肤病变之病因。

sentences.english: Invasive molar pregnancy is extremely rare, but is one of te pre-cancer stage for choriocarcinoma .
sentences.chinese: 侵袭性葡萄胎非常罕见，但却是绒癌的一种癌前病变。

sentences.english: Methods X-Ray films of 76 cases of ileocecal lesions were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾分析76例回盲部病变X线表现。

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical techniques with keyhole operation for treatment of the intracranial lesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨采用锁孔手术治疗颅内病变的手术技术。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of echocardiography in tricuspid valve lesions (TVL).
sentences.chinese: 目的评价超声心动图对三尖瓣病变的诊断价值。

sentences.english: The pulmonary vasculitis and Raynaud phenomenon might be related to immunologic abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 认为肺血管的病变及雷诺现象可能与免疫异常有关。

sentences.english: Both drug-eluting stents were associated with a marked reduction in target-lesion revascularization.
sentences.chinese: 两种药物涂层组靶血管病变的发生率均显著下降。

sentences.english: Results:Diabetic maculopathy was found in 35 of 83 patients with type 2 diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 结果在83例糖尿病病人中，有黄斑病变患者35例。

sentences.english: Renal changes were characterized by dilated tubules and protein casts in dilated tubules.
sentences.chinese: 病变特点为曲管扩张，内含蛋白管型。

sentences.english: Using in situ end labelling, the authors demonstrated for the first time that this change belonged to apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 经原位末端标记，首次证明本病的这种病变属于凋亡。

sentences.english: Lesion of ossicular chain is a common ear disease impairing the sense of hearing.
sentences.chinese: 听骨链病变是导致患者听力水平下降的普遍病症。

sentences.english: Results No spirochete was found in the lesions of sarcoidosis.
sentences.chinese: 结果在结节病肉芽肿病变内未发现螺旋体。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a quantifying model of retinopathy with vascular proliferation in mouse.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立可量化的血管增生性视网膜病变小鼠模型。

sentences.english: Physiological diseases and microbial infection make Chinese chestnut putrid.
sentences.chinese: 板栗腐烂由生理病变和微生物侵染所致。

sentences.english: ObjectiveThe degree of renal tubulointerstitial injury determines the prognosis of renal disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的肾小管间质病变程度是肾脏疾病预后的决定因素。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
